add.#cdata-section:
<!-- Beta Challenge Season -->
<personalseasonoverride uniquename="BETA_CHALLENGE" displayname="@ADCSEASON_BETA_CHALLENGE_TITLE" displayname_subtitle="@ADCSEASON_BETA_CHALLENGE_SUBTITLE" header_name="BETA_CHALLENGE" startref="EU_BETA_START" endref="EU_BETA_END" pve="1.5" gathering="1.5" fishing="3" farming="1.3" pspflatteningcurveexponent="0.5" founderbonus="2" activemonth="1">
    <psptrackers>
        <psptracker uniquename="BETA_CHALLENGE_PSPTRACKER_MAIN_01" type="main">
            <rewardtrigger unlockday="0" psp="25000">
                <rewards>
                    <vanityunlockreward id="REWARD_MAIN_01" itemref="UNIQUE_SHOES_VANITY_DUELIST" amount="1" boughtpremium="false" premium="true" nonpremium="true" />
                </rewards>
            </rewardtrigger>
            <rewardtrigger unlockday="0" psp="50000">
                <rewards>
                    <vanityunlockreward id="REWARD_MAIN_02" itemref="UNIQUE_HEAD_VANITY_DUELIST" amount="1" boughtpremium="false" premium="true" nonpremium="true" />
                </rewards>
            </rewardtrigger>
            <rewardtrigger unlockday="0" psp="75000">
                <rewards>
                    <vanityunlockreward id="REWARD_MAIN_03" itemref="UNIQUE_CAPE_VANITY_DUELIST" amount="1" boughtpremium="false" premium="true" nonpremium="true" />
                </rewards>
            </rewardtrigger>
            <rewardtrigger unlockday="0" psp="100000">
                <rewards>
                    <vanityunlockreward id="REWARD_MAIN_04" itemref="UNIQUE_ARMOR_VANITY_DUELIST" amount="1" boughtpremium="false" premium="true" nonpremium="true" />
                    <vanityunlockreward id="REWARD_MAIN_05" itemref="SKIN_COUGAR_DUELIST" amount="1" boughtpremium="false" premium="true" nonpremium="true" forfounder="true" />
                </rewards>
            </rewardtrigger>
        </psptracker>
    </psptrackers>
</personalseasonoverride>
